thread.title: Future Earns Fourth #1 Album; "FUTURE" First Week Sales Revealed
thread.title_full: Future Earns Fourth #1 Album; "FUTURE" First Week Sales Revealed

author: Trevor Smith
title: Future Earns Fourth #1 Album; "FUTURE" First Week Sales Revealed
text:
Home > Music > Future Earns Fourth #1 Album; "FUTURE" First Week Sales Revealed Future Earns Fourth #1 Album; "FUTURE" First Week Sales Revealed 2 0 Posted by Trevor Smith , Feb 26, 2017 at 07:10pm The Atlanta rapper is familiar with the #1 spot by now. 
Future's self-titled album, the first of two back-to-back releases from the Atlanta rapper, has debuted at #1 on the Billboard 200 . This marks Future 4th time topping the album charts, following 2016's EVOL , as well as 2015's DS2 and What A Time To Be Alive (with Drake ). 
The album moved a total of 140,000 equivalent album units , more than half of which was made up by streaming numbers. View the breakdown of the total, courtesy of Billboard , below. 
Streaming Activity: 73,000 (109 million song streams) 
Traditional Sales: 60,000 
Track equivalent album units: 7,000 
Future released his most recent album, Hndrxx , one week after FUTURE . The numbers from that project will be available next week.
